Detailed Description

The image class is where the pixel data is stored. It can be sub- classed for more specific uses, such as a Bitmap.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AggOO::Image::~Image ( void   )  [virtual]

Destructor

AggOO::Image::Image ( const CHAR *  filename,
BOOL  useEmbeddedColorManagement = FALSE 
)

GDI+ does not have image loading with regular ascii strings, but DevIL uses them to load images, so why not provide handlers for them directly?

Parameters:
filename Path to the file to load
useEmbeddedColorManagement (Currently unused in AggOO. Default is FALSE.)
